DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether web-based nursing intervention deliver postpartum period decrease symptom postpartum depression parent stress .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Web-based Nursing Intervention Reduction Postpartum Depression Parenting Stress .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose randomize , control trial determine whether receive standardize message ( text email ) postpartum nurse four times/week 6 month delivery decrease symptom postpartum depression parent stress . Enrolled woman randomize one three group . The first group receive usual care , phone call nurse within first week postpartum . The second group receive four standardize message week , content include infant care , maternal self-care inspirational material . The third group receive four standardize message week , addition , two weekly message offer option respond request nurse call . Baseline data collect postpartum hospitalization , follow-up occur email 3 week , 3 month 6 month postpartum .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Able speak read English 2 . Access device receive text email message 1 . NonEnglish speaking , 2 . No access device receive text email message 3 . Age young 18
